# UIScrollView.KeyboardDismissMode.onDrag

**Case**

A mode in which the keyboard dismisses when a drag begins.

## Declaration

```swift
case onDrag
```

## Constants

- **UIScrollView.KeyboardDismissMode.none**: A mode in which a drag doesn’t dismiss the keyboard.
- **UIScrollView.KeyboardDismissMode.interactive**: A mode in which the keyboard follows the dragging touch offscreen, and can be pulled upward again to cancel the dismiss.
- **UIScrollView.KeyboardDismissMode.onDragWithAccessory**: A mode in which the keyboard and accessory view dismiss together when a drag begins.
- **UIScrollView.KeyboardDismissMode.interactiveWithAccessory**: A mode in which the keyboard and accessory view both follow the dragging touch offscreen, and can be pulled upward again to cancel the dismiss.
